title: Adams Yates Flattens Field to Win Tour of Oman, Luke Lamperti Leaves on a High
content:
American rookie concludes first professional stage race brimming with confidence ahead of debut in Belgium at Kuurne-Brussels-Kuurne: 'It's been a great week.'

Read the full article at Adams Yates Flattens Field to Win Tour of Oman, Luke Lamperti Leaves on a High on Velo.
author: ahood
